column2: ggplot(df2, aes(x = ever_married, fill = ever_married)) + geom_bar(stat = "count") + geom_text(aes(label = ..count..), stat = "count", vjust = 1.5, color = "white") + ggtitle("Distribution of whether patients have ever been married") + scale_fill_manual(values = c("Yes" = "red", "No" = "blue")) + theme_classic()
